RelatedSentence: The state will pay the property taxes of individuals who lost their homes in Colorado floods or wildfires last year with legislation that Gov. John Hickenlooper has signed into law .

The state will pay the property taxes of individuals who lost their homes in Colorado floods or wildfires last year with legislation that Gov. John Hickenlooper has signed into law .
The Democratic governor signed the proposal Saturday in Lyons , one of the places hardest hit by flooding .
He also signed four other bills dealing with last year 's disasters .
He also signed four other bills dealing with last year 's disasters .
Hickenlooper also signed a proposal to distribute $ 5 million in grants to remove flood debris from watersheds , and a bill to exempt out - of - state disaster workers from Colorado income taxes .
